summary: As fog delays departure for a group of travellers bound for New York City, they wait at the lounge of London's Heathrow airport, with each passenger at a moment of crisis in his or her life.
cast: Elizabeth Taylor|Richard Burton|Louis Jourdan|Elsa Martinelli|Margaret Rutherford|Maggie Smith|Rod Taylor|Orson Welles|Linda Christian|Dennis Price|Richard Wattis|Ronald Fraser|David Frost|Robert Coote|Joan Benham|Michael Hordern|Lance Percival|Martin Miller|Peter Sallis|Stringer Davis|Clifton Jones|Moyra Fraser|Terence Alexander|Jack Arrow|Ray Austin|Reginald Beckwith|Virginia Bedard|John Blythe|Richard Briers|Pamela Buckley|Kofoworola Bucknor|Richard Caldicot|Joyce Carey|Jill Carson|Ann Castle|Griffith Davies|Jack Dearlove|Rosemary Dorken|Lee Fenton|Lewis Fiander|Chick Fowles|Arthur Goodman|Eileen Harvey|Renee Heimer|Alan Howard|Arthur Howard|Peter Illing|Dilashad Jamani|Gerry Judge|Pat Judge|Juba Kennerley|Angus Lennie|Aileen Lewis|Duncan Lewis|Leonard Llewellyn|Elisabeth Manford|Cal McCord|Clifford Mollison|Richard Neller|Charles Price|Maggie Rennie|Pat Ryan|Maureen See Tai|Paddy Smith|Barry Steele|Gordon Sterne|Oliver Tomlin|Pearl Walters|Brook Williams|Frank Williams|Barbara Yu Ling
title: Hotel Internacional
